product_name: Bolle Monarch Polarized Snow Goggles - Women's
long_description: Sleek styling and a high-performance polarized lens make the women's Bolle Monarch Polarized snow goggles a reliable choice for the snowy days ahead. Double-vented polycarbonate lens offers clear optics and high durability. Industrial-strength coating helps prevent fogging and reduces scratches without hindering optics. Specialized ports optimize airflow over the inside surface of lens to reduce fogging. Soft fleece backed by a single layer of multidensity foam offers a comfortable fit for your face. Polarized lenses block the horizontal component of reflected light, enhancing contrast and helping you stay alert to terrain features and icy patches. Polarized brown lens works best in sunny and lightly overcast conditions and allows 22% visible light transmission. Includes a microfiber storage bag. Bolle Monarch Polarized snow goggles fit medium faces.
